title: A Merciless Affection
description: When a seventh-year N.E.W.T. Potions field trip goes badly wrong, a chain of events is set in motion that may cost Snape more than his life and a student more than her heart. An increasingly AU SS/OC fan-fic set primarily during Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix. Available for free download at http://www.keokukvortex.com/download/...
author: Verity Brown
